includedAssets.title: Spy Kids
includedAssets.synopsis: Fast-moving family adventure starring Antonio Banderas and Carla Gugino as married spies whose latest mission doesn't quite go to plan, leaving their two kids (Alexa Vega and Daryl Sabara) to come to the rescue. As the most hyperactive moviemaker in the business, Robert Rodriguez unsurprisingly lets rip with a barrage of breathless action and enough gadgets to make Bond think it's his birthday. Alan Cumming and Teri Hatcher add even more colour as the wacky baddies.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The kids of secret agents need to follow in their footsteps to save them from danger.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Fast-moving family adventure starring Antonio Banderas and Carla Gugino as married spies whose latest mission doesn't quite go to plan, leaving their two kids (Alexa Vega and Daryl Sabara) to come to the rescue. As the most hyperactive moviemaker in the business, Robert Rodriguez unsurprisingly lets rip with a barrage of breathless action and enough gadgets to make Bond think it's his birthday. Alan Cumming and Teri Hatcher add even more colour as the wacky baddies.

includedAssets.title: Spy Kids 2: Island Of Lost Dreams
includedAssets.synopsis: Snappy family adventure with spy dad Antonio Banderas and crackpot scientist Steve Buscemi joining the pint-sized secret agents.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Snappy family adventure with spy dad Antonio Banderas and crackpot scientist Steve Buscemi joining the pint-sized secret agents.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Snappy family adventure with spy dad Antonio Banderas and crackpot scientist Steve Buscemi joining the pint-sized secret agents.

includedAssets.title: Spy Kids 3: Game Over
includedAssets.synopsis: The Spy Kids enter a 3D game world to take on Sylvester Stallone's evil Toymaker in the third adventure in Robert Rodriguez's dazzling action fantasy series. Pint-sized operative Juni Cortez (Daryl Sabara) returns to the Spy Kids fold after dropping out when his sister Carmen (Alexa Vega) is captured on a mission. She is stranded on level four of a virtual reality computer programme - Game Over - that has been created by Sly's ham-tastic Toymaker. Antonio Banderas and Carla Gugino return as the kids' super-agent parents.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The intrepid junior agents have a showdown in another dimension with evil genius The Toymaker (Sylvester Stallone). Ace adventure, packed with cameos.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Spy Kids enter a 3D game world to take on Sylvester Stallone's evil Toymaker in the third adventure in Robert Rodriguez's dazzling action fantasy series. Antonio Banderas and Carla Gugino return as the kids' super-agent parents.

includedAssets.title: Spy Kids Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: When a pair of former secret agents are tempted out of retirement and captured, it's up to their two bickering kids to save them and the world. Trilogy of family action-adventure starring Alexa Vega, Daryl Sabara, Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino, Danny Trejo, Sylvester Stallone and Jessica Alba.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When a pair of super-secret agents are captured, their two bickering kids must save the world. Family adventure trilogy starring Antonio Banderas.
